hero.name: Khang.
hero.description: I am a backend web developer, specializing in building robust, scalable, and secure server-side applications. I focus on writing clean, efficient code and designing optimized databases to ensure high performance and reliability

services.title: My Services
services.uiDesc: Creating intuitive and engaging user interfaces with modern design principles. I focus on user experience, accessibility, and responsive design to ensure optimal interaction across all devices.
services.webDesc: Building robust, scalable web applications using modern technologies. Specializing in both frontend and backend development with clean, maintainable code and optimized performance.
services.mobileDesc: Developing cross-platform mobile applications with native performance. Creating seamless user experiences for iOS and Android platforms using React Native and Flutter frameworks.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.contactDesc: Ready to start your next project? I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects. Let's connect and create something amazing together!

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.devMessage: This feature is currently under development. Please come back and try again later.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.desc: Full-featured e-commerce website with shopping cart, payment integration, and user authentication. Built with React.js and modern web technologies.

minimartFrontend.title: Mini Mart Frontend
minimartFrontend.desc: React-based frontend for supermarket management system with inventory tracking, sales management, and responsive design.

minimartBackend.title: Mini Mart Backend
minimartBackend.desc: RESTful API backend built with Spring Boot for supermarket management system with secure authentication and data management.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.desc: Responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Features dark/light theme, multi-language support, and smooth animations.

bookstore.title: Bookstore Management
bookstore.desc: Desktop application for bookstore management built with C# .NET WebForms, featuring inventory management and sales tracking.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.desc: New project in development. Stay tuned for more exciting features and innovative solutions.

highSchool.title: High School Graduation
highSchool.desc: Completed secondary education with focus on science and mathematics. Developed foundational knowledge and problem-solving skills that prepared me for university studies.

bachelor.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
bachelor.desc: Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science with focus on software development, algorithms, and modern programming paradigms. Gaining practical experience through projects and internships.

master.desc: Planning to pursue advanced studies in computer science with specialization in artificial intelligence, machine learning, or distributed systems.

frontend.title: Frontend Developer
frontend.desc: Future position developing responsive web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern frontend frameworks with focus on user experience.

backend.title: Backend Developer
backend.desc: Future role building robust backend systems using Spring Boot, Node.js, and database technologies to create scalable APIs and microservices.
